section.title: item sites master list of Item Sites
section.para: To access the master list of Item Sites in your system, select the "List Item Sites" option. The "following screen will appear:

At the top of the screen is a "Search for" field. To search for an Item Site, begin typing in the search field. As you type, the Item Site list will automatically scroll toward the Item Number you are typing. You can also search for Item Sites manually by scrolling through the list. The following views are also available:

listitem.para: Select to display a list of all Item Sites for all Sites.
Specify Site whose Item Sites you want to display.
Select to display active as well as inactive Item Sites.
